home.heroTitle: Preserving the MLS. Powering Its Future.
home.heroSub: Ally MLS exists to protect cooperation, transparency, and consumer choice. We unite independent MLSs into a strong, connected network — shielding the system from fragmentation and readying it for the legal challenges ahead.

aboutDavid.title: About David Anderson
bio: Scaled and exited multiple proptech companies.
Focused on aligning MLS incentives with member outcomes.
aboutDavid.quote: The MLS is the most powerful dataset in real estate—let’s align it with the people who own it.

sections.p: We are building a national footprint with a platform designed for voice, automation, and modern data standards.
Fragmentation slows innovation. Consolidation with aligned incentives creates the scale required to invest in quality, security, and usability.
Ally MLS prioritizes speed, accessibility, and transparent governance to help members close more deals and deliver a better consumer experience.
